meta.title: Sourcery for Front-End
meta.description: Start your career in software development with the intense program at Sourcery for Front-End. Complete the admission and enter our free of charge three-month academy to learn from our top specialists.

frontendIntro.heading: Push the Pixels with Sourcery Academy for Front-End
frontendIntro.paragraph: Start your career in software development with the intense program at Sourcery for Front-End. Complete the admission and enter our free of charge three-month academy to learn from our top specialists.

academyStepsSection.heading: Apply
academyStepsSection.paragraph: Academy students are given an opportunity to be immersed in a professional two-month course for the front-end developers, build their competence through trainings and individual or groups assignments.

academyStepsSection.heading: Pass the admission
academyStepsSection.paragraph: Entry test is performed by those candidates who submit their summary. Test results define a priority list of candidates who are invited into the workshop. We accept 20 candidates with highest marks into academy.

academyStepsSection.heading: Learn from the experts
academyStepsSection.paragraph: Students will discover all types, techniques and design approaches. They will learn how to write semantic elements in HTML, apply advanced CSS techniques, understand accessibility standards and many more.

academyStepsSection.heading: Join the company
academyStepsSection.paragraph: The Academy starts in the end of October and lasts until January.. Top graduates will be invited for an interview to become a Junior Front-End Software Engineer.

admissionSections.heading: Introduction and workshop
admissionSections.text: 4 to 5 hours of activities. We will introduce the Sourcery academy, tell you more about what we do as front-end developers, get to know each other and have a fun workshop challenging your critical thinking, problem solving, communication and team working skills.

admissionSections.heading: You will learn:
text: Agile methodology, build tools and task runners

admissionSections.heading: An interview
admissionSections.text: Only the top candidates after the final exam are invited to a job interview which will challenge your technical skills and English knowledge.

apply.heading: Apply to academy
apply.paragraph: Start your career in software development with the intense program at Sourcery for Front-End Developers.
